name: Prism (itch) (Garron Denney)
description:
Title: Prism 

Platform: PC Game Genre: Puzzle

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: You are a prism with a goal to guide the beam of light to the goal, unlocking the next level you have access to different refractors, which guide the light in different ways. 

Instructions: Mouse left-click and hold to drag the pieces, and the prism can be rotated by mouse left-click as well.

Game Design Team: Garron Denney
